channel.title: Server uploading
channel.description: okay i have my server and client ready for players to play. What and how do i compress both files in too one and then make it where when i upload it to a file sharing web when players download it where they can play while im hosting. People are going to say port forward im new at making servers my first time so dont be flaming and stuff just need help so how do i do so.

item.title: Server uploading
item.dc:creator: @supernovarsps supernovarsps
item.description:
@supernovarsps wrote:

like to compress it and then if i upload to file sharing websites will i be hosting and will other players be able to get on? I can get on this computer but how do i get to were other players can get on.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pur3_L0v3 wrote:

Wait are you looking for a port forwarding tutorial?

Read full topic

item.title: Server uploading
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

hmm, if i understood what you said, you should use WINRAR or WINZIP to compress your server client, and then upload it to a files hoster, like www.sendspace.com.

good luck.

Read full topic
